column1: 1|Medina Pilgrimage|108|Embark on a spiritual journey to the city of Medina
column2: one of the holiest cities in Islam
column3: on our "Medina Pilgrimage" tour in Saudi Arabia. Visit the sacred Mosque of the Prophet and pay your respects to the Prophet Muhammad's tomb. Discover the rich history and culture of Medina as we take you on a guided tour of the city's historic landmarks

column1: 2|Journey Through the Ancient Ruins of Mosul|117|Discover the rich cultural heritage of Mosul as we take you on a journey through its ancient ruins. The tour will start with a visit to the famous Nineveh Ruins
column2: home to the ancient Assyrian empire. We will then take you to the stunning Al-Nouri Mosque and the Al-Hadba Minaret
column3: both of which were destroyed during the recent conflict and are now being restored. After that
column4: we will explore the beautiful Old City
column5: with its narrow streets and traditional architecture. Finally
column6: we will end our tour at the Mosul Museum
column7: where you can see some of the most valuable artifacts from the region's history. This tour is perfect for history buffs and anyone interested in learning more about this fascinating region|English|10|0|16.3.2023. 23:59:00|4|3|4

column1: 3|Discovering Dhaka: A Cultural Journey through Bangladesh|170|Join us on a journey through the vibrant city of Dhaka
column3: and discover its rich cultural heritage. We will start our tour at the historic Lalbagh Fort
column4: where you will learn about the Mughal Empire and the fort's significance in Bangladesh's history. Next

column6: also known as the Pink Palace
column7: and explore its beautiful architecture and fascinating exhibits.|English|10|0|17.3.2023. 23:59:00|6|3|6|12

column1: 5|Discover Osaka's Hidden Gems|186|Embark on a journey to discover Osaka's lesser-known treasures
